LoginInstructions: Click this button or the extension icon to login to Picarto
notificationsSetting: Show a Desktop Notification when people start streaming
alertSetting: Play a sound when people start streaming
autoMarkSetting: Automatically mark Notifications as read after viewing them
premiumSetting: Always show Premium Only Streamer Options
updateMultiSetting: Update Multistream information more often when streaming
saveError: An Error occurred. Please try again
resetError: An Error occurred. Please try again
